Former UNC players in women’s World Cup

By Lauren McHale

The U.S. women’s national team hasn’t won a World Cup in 12 years, when former UNC-Chapel Hill soccer star Mia Hamm was on the team. But after a dramatic victory over Brazil on Sunday, two former Tar Heel players, Heather O’Reilly and Tobin Heath, have a chance to get that win at this year’s World Cup in Germany.
